basic_info.description: I am a motivated, versatile web developer ready to apply my technical skills in a new career. I love creating applications with the user experince in mind. I enjoy working in teams and solving problems along the way.

projects.title: VG Project
projects.description: Simple database searching website that allows users to see upcoming video game releases, search for specific games, or use a button to see a random game with the help of the IGDB API.

projects.title: Tixxly
projects.description: Tixxly is a full stack application that allows users to reserve movie tickets and order concessions before arriving at the theater.Tixxly was built by a two-person team over the course of a week. I focused on connecting our database to our front end, rendering the data using EJS, and some styling with CSS.
